snippet: The killing of a rebel fighter linked to Al Qaeda called new attention to the ideological differences among rebels fighting the government of President Bashar al-Assad.
abstract: Mysterious assassination of a Syrian rebel fighter linked to Al Qaeda calls new attention to the ideological differences among the Islamists fighting the government of Pres Bashar al-Assad and threatens to set off new strife among the rebels.
lead_paragraph: The killing of a rebel fighter linked to Al Qaeda called new attention to the ideological differences among rebels fighting the government of President Bashar al-Assad.

headline.seo: Killing of Rebel With Qaeda Links Opens Debate on Syrian Opposition
headline.main: Assassination Highlights Rifts Facing Syria Rebels
headline.print_headline: Assassination Highlights Rifts Facing Syria Rebels
